name: Washoe County Golf Course
description: Historic Reno muni favored by golf groups, leagues, and tournaments.

faqs.question: What’s included in Washoe County golf group packages?
faqs.answer: Lodging, guaranteed tee times at Washoe County, carts, and concierge planning. Add transportation, dining, and multi-course options.

faqs.question: How much do Washoe County group packages cost?
faqs.answer: Typical range is $179–$399 per golfer depending on season, lodging, and group size.

faqs.question: Do you handle corporate or tournament groups?
faqs.answer: Yes—room blocks, tee-time blocks, tournament setup, and transportation for corporate and leisure groups.

meta.title: Washoe County Golf Course | Reno Golf Groups & Stay and Play
meta.description: Book Washoe County Golf Course in Reno with golf groups, tee times, and stay & play packages. Expert planning for buddies, corporate, and tournaments.
